Translations.Text: Tumhi sanguna taka ki he inkari lokanno
Na mi upasana karato tyaci, jyaci tumhi upasana karata
Na tumhi upasana karanare ahata tyaci, jyaci mi upasana karato
Ani na mi upasana karena tyaci, jyaci tumhi upasana karata
Ani na tumhi tyaci upasana karala, jyaci mi upasana karato
Tumacyasathi tumaca dina (dharma) ahe ani majhyasathi majha dina (dharma) ahe
Jevha allahatarphe madata ani vijaya prapta ho'ila
Ani lokanna tumhi allahacya dina (dharma) kade samuhasamuhanni yetana pahala
Tevha apalya palanakartyaci stuti prasansesaha pavitrata varnana karu laga ani tyacyajavala ksama yacaneci prarthana karita raha. Nihsansaya, to motha tauba (ksama-yacana) kabula karanara ahe
Abu lahabace donhi hata tutale ani to (svatah) nasta jhala
Na tara tyaci sampatti tyacya kami ali ani na tyaci kama'i
Lavakaraca to bhadakanarya agita ja'una padela
Ani tyaci patnihi (ja'ila), ji lakade vahuna nenari ahe
Ticya galyata khajuricya salica pila ghatalela dorakhanda asela
